refnamediv.refpurpose: Arpeggiate the spectral components of a streaming pv signal.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This opcode arpeggiates spectral components, by amplifying one bin and attenuating all the others around it. Used with an LFO it will provide a spectral arpeggiator similar to Trevor Wishart's CDP program specarp.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: fsig pvsarp fsigin, kbin, kdepth, kgain

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kdepth -- depth of attenuation of surrounding bins
kgain -- gain boost applied to target bin

warning.para: It is unsafe to use the same f-variable for both input and output of pvs opcodes. Using the same one might lead to undefined behavior on some opcodes. Use a different one on the left and right sides of the opcode.
